file_content.text: Ha! Even with half of Corellia in flames, the council still stands with the Empire.
After seeing the damage to the Legislature, I was expecting an army. You should have come prepared.
The council has the authority here. You may have the Corellians, but we have Corellia.
I assure you, Darth Hadra, this holdout room is impenetrable. The Republic will never break through--
Save your breath, Councillor. Even your little hiding place was not immune from the Ion Wall.
You've turned the Legislature into a battlefield. Is this your plan to lure the council back to the Republic?
It's never too late to admit you were wrong.
If they were willing.
The Empire would let the council go that easily?
Is that an option?
You act as if they're hostages. Is it so hard to believe they would join the Empire willingly?
You can keep them.
But you've overestimated me. All these men against one guardian... perhaps we can even the odds.
The holdout room is designed to protect and hide the council. There are no comm stations here. All transmissions are blocked.
Your allies are out of reach. Can you face me without your precious Republic?
I'm willing to die for Corellia's freedom.
I'm not afraid.
Corellia's made her choice. The Republic just refuses to accept it.
They're not the only ones.
Even if I fall, Corellia will keep fighting.
You can't win.
Corellia's future has been decided. Her people will adapt, or die.
I think we've got a few other options.
You've done everything you can to avoid a fair fight.
Not much choice.
You're the last obstacle between the Empire and Corellia. I prefer a quick victory.
Then you must be thrilled to see us.
All I want is the council. Can't we make a deal?
Let's not be hasty.
Corellia's part of the Empire now. We wouldn't abandon her leaders.
Just her people, right?
General Aves? Republic dispatch? Anybody, come in!
I don't believe you.
Do you really expect them to answer a call they can't hear?
Some of us have a sixth sense about these things.
I've beaten too many Sith Lords to back down now.
Bring it on, lady.
The council stands with the Empire. Killing me won't change that.
Who said we weren't doing it for fun?
When I heard you were going after the council, I rounded up CorSec's best. I wouldn't miss this for anything.
Then you've chosen your fate. Those who resist Imperial rule will die by my hands.
The Republic is weak. The council made the right choice.
